entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Way to unload a Managed assembly from native library using hostfxr #25230
  • A multitargeting project that references 2 projects with the same name under 2 different TFMs fails to compile #25224
  • What is the intended way to target a specific version of the .NET Runtime? #25220

Closed

  • NETSDK1045 The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 6.0. Either target .NET 5.0 or lower, or use a version of the .NET SDK that supports .NET 6.0. ConsoleEF C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk\5.0.407\Sdks\Microsoft.NET.Sdk\targets\Microsoft.NET.TargetFrameworkInference.targets 141 #25218

PullRequests

Created

  • Make the ImplicitUsings feature minimally define each imported namespace #25225
    Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Next two test projects to move to helix #25197
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25130
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.NET.Compatibility.Common.targets #25132
    Area-Compatibility
  • Update build.yml to target loc build at 6.0.4xx #25195
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • bump WarningLevel to 7 for .NET 7 #24826
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • simplify arch for preload library #24870
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25181
    Area-Infrastructure
